body_html:
@rmlarsen already implemented tf.matrix_solve with lu decomposition:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/b10f50ff15944badb7262a207f6628dfa52d6a9d/tensorflow/core/kernels/matrix_solve_op.cc

It would be nice to expose the decomposition, like tf.cholesky_solve, so that it can be reused on the next solve if A doesn't change.
